column1: What was Ahab using to attack Moby Dick when he lost his leg?
During the first part of the voyage, what kind of sounds do the crew think they hear from the cargo hold?
The fact that Ahab is using the Pequod for a different purpose than its owners intended means he could be charged with ______
When Ahab bursts into fits of near-mad shrieking, what does Ishmael think is the cause?
Who are the “five dusky phantoms” that appear when the first whale hunt begins?
